attributes.action: go and get the billions of pounds owed to us by the eu for the floods

attributes.background: the pm should go and get thebillions of punds owed to us by the eu to help farmers, foold vicitin,s. we oaid millions to help the victins of the sunami on boxing day 2004 the pm should get the money to help his own people.
